info.name: Helpdesk API
info.description: API collection for the Helpdesk Ticketing System

request.description: Register a new user account. Default role is 'student'.

response.name: Validation Error Response

request.description: Login and retrieve authentication token
Logout and invalidate the current token
Get the current authenticated user's profile information
Get all categories with their subcategories. This is a public endpoint that doesn't require authentication.
Create a new category. Requires admin role.
Get a specific category by ID with its subcategories. Requires admin role.
Update a specific category. Requires admin role.
Delete a specific category. Requires admin role.
Create a new subcategory for a specific category. Requires admin role.
Update a specific subcategory. Requires admin role.
Delete a specific subcategory. Requires admin role.
Get a list of all users. Requires admin role.
Get user statistics. Requires admin role.
Get a specific user by ID. Requires admin role.
Update a specific user's information. Requires admin role.
Update a specific user's role. Requires admin role.
Delete a specific user. Requires admin role.

formdata.value: Saya mengalami kesulitan saat melakukan registrasi mata kuliah. Sistem menampilkan error ketika saya mencoba mendaftar.

request.description: Create a new ticket. Available to all authenticated users.

response.name: Success Response

formdata.value: Saya mengalami kesulitan saat melakukan registrasi mata kuliah. Sistem menampilkan error ketika saya mencoba mendaftar.

request.description: Get all tickets with optional filters. Tickets are filtered based on user role (admin sees all, disposisi sees assigned tickets, students see only their own tickets).

request.description: Get ticket statistics. Statistics are filtered based on user role.
Get details of a specific ticket. Access is based on user role (admin/disposisi see all, students see only their own tickets).

request.description: Update a ticket's status. Authorization is checked in the controller.
Add feedback to a ticket. Authorization is checked in the controller.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Soft delete a ticket. Authorization is checked in the controller.
Assign a ticket to a disposisi user. Requires admin role.
Restore a soft-deleted ticket. Requires admin role.
Get notifications for the authenticated user with optional filters.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "notifications": [
            {
                "id": "1",

}

request.description: Mark a specific notification as read.
Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user.
Create a new notification. Typically used by admin/disposisi users.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:

item.name: Dashboard
item.description: Dashboard endpoints for different user roles

request.description: Get dashboard information for the authenticated user. Available to all authenticated users.
Get admin dashboard information. Requires admin role.
Get staff dashboard information. Requires admin or disposisi role.

variable.description: ID of the currently authenticated or selected user
